ygData.subject: FACTS ON ARADUNE aka BRAD McQUAID
ygData.msgSnippet:
Jesus!  Aradune can be whatever the hell he wants to be and do whatever the
hell he wants to do. . .GET IT . . .HE IS THE REASON WE HAVE THE GAME.  I
followed
ygData.messageBody:
Jesus! Aradune can be whatever the hell he wants to be and do whatever the
hell he wants to do. . .GET IT . . .HE IS THE REASON WE HAVE THE GAME. I
followed this game for 2 years before release and a year before beta even
came out. . .this game was supposed to flop long before beta and 989 was
going to back out altogether. . he made it happen so jesus I hope he has the
best items HE can imagine!

As for him being a GM. . Brad McQuaid is the PRODUCER and LEAD DEVELOPER at
989 studios here in San Diego. Aradune is his lv 50 GM ranger! In case you
havent noticed he is still part of the "Guild Creator" team and has to log
on at least for 1 hour once a week to create guilds. . he uses Aradune for
this, and of course. . .to slay Lady Vox. LOL

Sorry for the long post, just some FACTUAL info. I am sorry everyone but I
will no longer be subscribed to this list. . not worth the damn 50 e-mails
to delete every night full of bickering about nonsense! I have maybe used 2
pieces of information from this board. Good travels to you all, and please
no one take this personally!

Frustrated Demur

;(


-----Original Message-----
From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com' <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 12:11 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] ARDUNE IS NOT A GM


>From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
>You are wrong. Aradune Mithara is a GM.
>
>Aradune with GM tag on...
>http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/adventures/LadyVox04.htm
>
>Aradune with GM tag off...
>http://www.firesofheaven.org/foh/adventures/LadyVox22.htm
>
>He also plays a regular character on Veeshan that is not Aradune. He
>has not released the name of that character. Here is what he said about
>his group though...
>
>"I live in the San Diego area and have a Cox @home cable modem and it
>rocks -- very rarely do I have any connectivity problems and/or packet
>loss.
>
>My group, which ranges from 15-22, can virtually live in [Permafrost]
>with rarely a death. You probably want to bring some friends with ya :)
>"
>

>> programer Brad McQuade or
>> however u spell his last name, hehe. but Ardune is not a GM. he is
>> just Brad's character in game.
>>
